metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16908 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Horde Groupware 5.2.19, there is XSS via the Name field during creation of a new Resource. This can be leveraged for remote code execution after compromising an administrator account, because the CVE-2015-7984 CSRF protection mechanism can then be bypassed.

criterions.comment: php-horde-kronolith: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
